contentfulFixPicsFrontpage.head: Welcome to your place to Fix Pictures

block1.block1: Remember those old cameras and pictures you printed carefully and use to show everyone in nicely crafted albums ?

block2.block2: When last time you looked into those or shown others ?

block3.block3: But how many times you wanted to show those but thought it's just not worth the hassle of bringing those heavy albums and most likely being humiliated because of faded out quality of pictures stored in dark for years ?

block4.block4: Are you scared that those photos might have lost their shine over years as they were not stored in right humidity and temperature ? Do you feel ashamed that you may have lost many of those memories that were so close to your heart ?

block5.block5: How many times you wanted to restore those memories and cherish them - but stepped back because of high cost of photo restoration ?

block6.block6: Wait no longer ! Fix-Pics is here. We offer simple, fast, affordable and quality photo restoration service
